# spatial3DImmersive

**Type Property**

Displays the image’s spatial 3D representation (if generated) with an immersive presentation style.

## Declaration

```swift
static let spatial3DImmersive: ImagePresentationComponent.ViewingMode
```

## 3D presentation of generated spatial scenes

- **spatial3D**: Displays the image’s spatial 3D representation (if generated) with a windowed presentation style.
